titles.title: Recognizing the importance of honoring the Nation's children and expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that National Children's Day should be established.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 7/21/2004--Introduced. Recognizes the importance of honoring the Nation's children. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that a National Children's Day should be established in honor of the Nation's children. Encourages adult citizens of the United States to set aside time to support, embrace, and listen to a child.
